title: [Client]  Alot of players from southern states can't connect to client chat.
body:
As you can see from other posts alot of people from the southern states like texas, louisiana (this is where I live) and Mississippi are blocked from the client chat functions meaning: They can't see their friends list, they can't message anyone, they can't invite anyone, and probably more importantly they can't talk in pre game and post game lobbies. 


Not a PC issue. this is a Riot related issue.

replies.body: Resolve this quickly Riot, or the South will rise again!

> [{quoted}](name=Merxamers,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Nf5ToE3O,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-03-04T18:33:32.510+0000)
>
> Resolve this quickly Riot, or the South will rise again!

I'm from Australia. You don't know even know what south is :)

>
> I'm from Australia. You don't know even know what south is :)

I'm connected now! I just tried it.
TRIGGERED.

{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}}  ON THE WAY!
lmfao
Haha!

Hey folks,

We want to understand this issue a bit better, could you please run tracerts to 192.64.174.69 and post here the results? It will help us towards investigation. 

Instructions on how to perform tracerts can be found here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2

Thanks!

I'm having the same problem here in Tennessee, and I doubt its the ISP because what are the odds we all have the same provider.
Please let me know if this issue continues now. We've taken offline what looks to be the offending device to work on it.

Unfortunately this particular thread was actually about an issue that happened about a month ago where alot of the southern states were affected but now that issue has been resolved. If you're having issues this is likely not the same problem so open a different thread because no one will likely reply to this one and see if Riot has any suggestions.
Just confirming: This worked for a period and has stopped working again?

> [{quoted}](name=Korensky,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Nf5ToE3O,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2016-03-04T18:57:38.480+0000)
